text:
To* Mr* Thomas Parrish
3
November 13, 1953
Will you write, wlro, or phone this office and let us know what you
con do? Tell us which completed series you can get to us the fastest?
(We must get our "program offering" out to stations by the end of next
week*) If you will give us the word that you will complete the programs,
v.e will ship the tapes back to you Immediately*
We are at present producing an NAEB program format "dope-sheet" to
ae: ist in the planning of programs for the Network. As it may be of help
to you, we will send a copy as soon as it is reedy.
Best personal regards,
JHido
ccs Harry J. Skcrala, NAEB
Waldo Abbot, WHOM
Bernard Buck, WHIG
Northrop Dawson, EB08f
William Harley, WHA
H.E. Salley, WTO
